definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture
husband of older female cousin via male line

sentences.english: Oh, sweetie, you are my second cousin's best friend.
sentences.chinese: 噢，甜心，你是我二堂姐最好的朋友。

sentences.english: My cousin is the same age me.
He had a cousin named Susan, who moved to Missouri.
sentences.chinese: 他有一個名字叫做蘇珊的堂姐，搬到了密蘇里。

sentences.english: One of Sue's cousins got married last week and the Clarks all went to the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 蘇的一個堂姐上週結婚，克拉克全家都去參加了婚禮。
她是我的第一代堂姐妹。

sentences.english: Michelle was her 7) first cousin and it was she who had introduced Rose to George.
sentences.chinese: 米歇爾是她的堂姐妹，是她將羅斯介紹給喬治認識的。

sentences.english: She is a first cousin to me.
sentences.chinese: 她是我的第一代堂姐妹。

definition: older female cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
wife of older male cousin via female line
father's female cousin via female line
younger female cousin via female line
husband of older female cousin via female line
younger male cousin via female line
